#Text=Football : Atlético Madrid beats Marseille 3-0 to win third Europa League title
#Text=Saturday , May 19 , 2018
#Text=On Wednesday , Spanish capital football club Atlético Madrid defeated French team Olympique de Marseille 3 – 0 to win the UEFA Europa League Final at the Stade de Lyon , in France .

#Text=French striker Antoine Griezmann scored a brace ( two goals in one game ) , one goal in each half , and Atlético 's captain Gabi netted the third goal a few minutes before the final whistle as Atlético won the UEFA Europa League for the third time .
#Text=This was Marseille 's third defeat in three Europa League or UEFA Cup finals , never netting a single goal in the final .
#Text=File photo of Antoine Griezmann who scored twice and won Man of the Match
#Text=Image : DSanchez17 .
#Text=( CC BY 2.0 )
#Text=Marseille had greater ball possession and better passing accuracy .
#Text=Marseille were awarded three free-kicks in the first ten minutes of the match .
#Text=The French side created several chances in the first half but failed to convert any into a goal .
#Text=Around the 20th minute , Marseille 's André Zambo Anguissa lost the ball , as Madrid 's captain Gabi assisted Griezmann who opened the scoring with his left foot .
#Text=A couple of minutes later , a referee made the first booking of the match .
#Text=Atlético 's Šime Vrsaljko received a yellow card for a bad foul .
#Text=Just after the half-hour mark , Marseille 's midfielder Dimitri Payet was injured and replaced by Maxime Lopez .
#Text=Payet has provided 22 assists in all competitions this season .
#Text=The first half ended in a 1 – 0 lead for the Spanish side .
#Text=Marseille 's Jordan Amavi was the second player to receive a yellow card .
#Text=At the beginning of the second half , Vrsaljko was replaced by Juanfran due to injury .
#Text=Less than five minutes into the second half , Frenchman Griezman doubled the lead , scoring another left-footed goal , assisted by Koke .
#Text=Koke also assisted Gabi in the 89th minute , who scored his first goal for Atlético since August 2015 .
#Text=34-year-old Gabi became the oldest player to score a goal in a Europa final .
#Text=Fernando Torres was substituted for Griezmann in the 90th minute .
#Text=Marseille committed eighteen fouls in the match , twice as many as their opponents .
#Text=Madrid 's goalkeeper Jan Oblak acheived his seventh clean sheet in this season 's European competitions — UEFA Champions League and Europa League .
#Text=Griezmann was awarded the Man of the Match award .
#Text=After winning the match , Griezmann said , " I 've been working to experience such a moment for many years " .
#Text=Marseille 's defender Adil Rami said , " The final step was too far for us but we fought for everything .
